name: Postal Delivery
description:
The rural America is struck by catastrophe and devastated by zombies! The postal office tried rolling out a new aerial delivery system but that failed. Everyone's packages are all over towns and it's up to you, an old delivery robot, to collect them
and deliver them to the right address!

Postal Delivery is my first public game made in Unreal Engine. With this project I intend to enroll for Breda University for the course Creative Media & Games Technologies. I'd highly prefer if you could record your game play footage and post links to it in the comments. But if you can't record foot there's a GForm inquiry for you to fill out. I don't like this method but it's the easiest way to gather feedback.

https://forms.gle/xzSr43WWH1NjeVZR8

Thank you

S. Jack J.

Playtime to complete - 10 to 15 minutes
